headline: Adobe Firefly Embeds Deeper In Enterprise Marketing Through ITG Partnership
summary: Adobe (NasdaqGS:ADBE) is integrating its Firefly generative AI into ITG's Storyteq content platform. The partnership also links Firefly with ITG's Halo Intelligence capabilities for automated content workflows. The collaboration focuses on enterprise use cases in marketing, content production, and customer engagement. For Adobe, known for its Creative Cloud and Experience Cloud lines, this move is another step in tying generative AI directly into enterprise workflows rather than leaving it...
